_comment1: Persistent information about a flow cytometer, to be supplied by TA3

tasbe_cytometer_configuration._comment1: the rdf:about field is a URI that persistently identifies this instrument and optical configuration
tasbe_cytometer_configuration._comment2: the channels list all of the parameters of interest in an FCS file from the instrument

channels._comment1: name must exactly match the channel name in the FCS files
channels.name: FITC-A
channels._comment2: excitation is the channel laser; these examples show the recommended values
channels._comment3: emission_filter is the channel optical filter; these examples show the recommended values
channels._comment4: emission_filter can also be of type 'longpass', which has cutoff instead of center and width
